page.title: 13Village Wedding.
page.content: On the 29th.ofJune 1985 Sarah Ayres of The Green,Old Dalby will marry Stephen Hendey of Melton Mowbray in Old Dalby church.Sarah used to be a pupil at our primary school. The bride's dress is cream silk with Nottinghamshire lace.The men will be wearing top hats and tails.There will be 125 guests at the wedding,mainly relatives and friends of the couple. The reception will be held in a marquee on the lawn of Sarahs house. The wedding cake is 3 tiers high and covered with pink icing.The meal will end with lots of "fattening puddings" said Mrs.Ayres.In the evening there will be a disco,singing and dancing. Sarah and Stephen are going to Corsica for their honeymoon.Afterwards they will live in Melton Mowbray.
